MISSING_ACCESS_TOKEN: You need to provide an accessToken to verify data
START_VERIFICATION_CALL: Sending data to backend for verification
START_CHECKING_RESPONSE: Verification response received - start checking response
RESPONSE_JSON_PARSED_SUCCESSFUL: Verification response has been parsed successfully.
UPP_HAS_BEEN_FOUND: UPP for that data has been found on Ubirch server
VERIFICATION_FAILED: Verification failed! No anchor for that data can be found!
NO_BLXTX_FOUND: The data has not yet anchored in any blockchain
WARNING_EMPTY_BLXTX_FOUND: Attention! Empty Blockchain data set found
SUCCESS_INFO: For more information about anchoring click the ubirch icon to open verification details in ubirch console or click the blockchain icons to open corresponding blockchain explorer
VERIFICATION_FAILED.headline: Verification Failed!
VERIFICATION_FAILED_EMPTY_RESPONSE: Verification Failed!! Empty certificate or missing seal
VERIFICATION_FAILED_MISSING_SEAL_IN_RESP: Verification Failed!! Empty certificate or missing seal
FAIL_INFO: No blockchain anchor for given data
JSON_PARSE_FAILED: Internal JSON format responded from server could not be parsed
JSON_MALFORMED: Building internal JSON format from input string failed
INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: Internal Server Error. Something went wrong.
